newsitem.title: UK: BayernHypo sets $175 million five-year FRN.
newsitem.headline: BayernHypo sets $175 million five-year FRN.

text.p: The following subordinated floating-rate issue was announced by lead manager BZW.
BORROWER BAYERISCHE HYPOTHEKEN- UND WECHSEL-BANK AG
TYPE FRN MARGIN +18.75 BP PAY DATE 11.MAR.97
LAST MOODY AA3 ISS PRICE 99.90 FULL FEES 0.25
LISTING LONDON DENOMS (K) 1-10-100 SALE LIMITS US/GB/DE
NEG PLG NO CRS DEFLT NO FORCE MAJ IPMA 2
GOV LAW ENGLISH HOME CTRY GERMANY TAX PROVS STANDARD
